lead_paragraph: Paul Casey of England birdied the 16th and 18th holes in a seven-under-par 66 yesterday to take a one-stroke lead over Colin Montgomerie after three rounds of the Johnnie Walker Championship in Gleneagles, Scotland.
snippet: Paul Casey of England birdied the 16th and 18th holes in a seven-under-par 66 yesterday to take a one-stroke lead over Colin Montgomerie after three rounds of the Johnnie Walker Championship in Gleneagles, Scotland.
